general_info.summary: This text outlines campus tour availability and application deadlines for Amity University's Noida campus, with tours offered Monday to Friday at specific times. It also lists various Amity University locations across India and several academic and administrative departments/initiatives, including the Directorate of Innovation and Technology Transfer and Amity University Summer School, along with a mention of a LinkedIn partnership.
general_info.raw_content:
Campus Tour available at Noida Campus: Monday to Friday Only (Excluding holidays)
Campus Tour Timings are:
11:00 AM 12:00 PM 2:30 PM 3:30 PM
Last Date to Apply is 16th August 202516 Aug 2025
Last date to apply for UG & PG programmes for this round of admissions31 Aug 2025
